title: My league please help me :l
body:
Hi Riot, as Elementz (OCE!) i would like to make a complaint about my behavior, i've done nothing wrong, i am in bronze 2, and you guys are giving me warnings for things i dont do, i try to communicate with my team but they never listen please i've done nothing wrong and the people i have reported about, please read it it is a very importent thing thanks!

-Elementz (OCE!)

replies.body: Yeah, your League seems busted, just about as busted as your good for nothing scam. Re-add me and gift me the equivalent charges or your account shall be mine. I hope that's understood ^^

>i try to communicate with my team but they never listen

How are you talking to your team-mates? If they aren't listening to you then you've done something to piss them off.
